June 9, 1991 D Swindon Entertainment Contest (Open Section)
Swindon Entertainment Contest (Open Section) 10 Entertainments Contest Swindon Entertainment Contest swindon-brass-festival-section-1
None
Wyvern Theatre, Swindon 1st prize: £250 and the Aldbourne Trophy. 2nd prize: £150 and the Rayburn Music Tours Trophy. 3rd prize: £100 and the Ken Savage Trophy. Best Soloist: The Harris Calne Trophy. Presentation/Deportment: The Crosby Doors Trophy - Aldbourne.
Draw 5.30 pm, commence 6 pm.
